title: How to Make Vegan Red Velvet Pancakes

steps.headline: Whisk the soy milk and vinegar together in a small bowl.
Mix together the wheat flour, self-rising flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking soda and baking powder in another medium bowl.
Fold the soy milk and vinegar mixture into the flour mixture.
Heat the vegetable oil on a large skillet.
Add 1/3 cup of the batter onto the skillet.
Flip the pancake over when bubbles start to appear and let it cook on the opposite side.
Remove the pancake from the skillet after both sides of the pancakes are cooked and begin cooking the next pancake.
Whisk together the vegan sour cream, maple syrup and lemon juice when all pancakes have been cooked.
Serve the pancakes hot with the sour cream maple syrup "frosting" drizzled on top.

text: Whisk the soy milk and vinegar together in a small bowl.  Mix together the wheat flour, self-rising flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking soda and baking powder in another medium bowl.  Fold the soy milk and vinegar mixture into the flour mixture. Mix all ingredients together well. Heat the vegetable oil on a large skillet.  Add 1/3 cup of the batter onto the skillet.  Flip the pancake over when bubbles start to appear and let it cook on the opposite side.  Remove the pancake from the skillet after both sides of the pancakes are cooked and begin cooking the next pancake.  Whisk together the vegan sour cream, maple syrup and lemon juice when all pancakes have been cooked.  Serve the pancakes hot with the sour cream maple syrup "frosting" drizzled on top.
